definition: blessed by heaven (idiom)/enjoying exceptional advantages/favored by nature
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
thick/deep or profound/kind/generous/rich or strong in flavor/to favor/to stress

sentences.english: College Chinese teaching plays a most important role in this way.
sentences.chinese: 而大學語文在人才培養方面具有得天獨厚的優勢。

sentences.english: Hepu gulf is of unique geographical position for pearl's growing.
sentences.chinese: 合浦沿海得天獨厚的海灣是繁衍珍珠的最佳場所。

sentences.english: And the frigid climate bestows Heilongjiang rich resources of ice and snow.
sentences.chinese: 寒冷的氣候賦予了其得天獨厚的冰雪資源。

sentences.english: In the region of Three Gorges, resource of salt spring was very rich and its history of salt production was very long.
sentences.chinese: 三峽地區，鹽泉資源得天獨厚，泉鹽生產歷史悠久。

sentences.english: Ye who read here are blessed.
sentences.chinese: 燁誰看這裏有得天獨厚。

sentences.english: Ningbo Port is a famous deepwater port for its good natural conditions.
sentences.chinese: 寧波港是世界著名的深水良港，自然條件得天獨厚。

sentences.english: Sanduao Habour is richly endowed by nature with broad estuary and deep water.
sentences.chinese: 三都澳港闊水深，具有得天獨厚的優良自然條件。

sentences.english: Convenient transportation, ground-source rich, with unique advantages for development.
sentences.chinese: 交通便捷，地源豐富，具有得天獨厚的發展優勢。

sentences.english: Endowed with unique location, Hamburg becomes the center of water and land transportation.
sentences.chinese: 得天獨厚的地理位置，使漢堡成爲水陸交通的中心。

sentences.english: As a performer, Mr. Curtis drew on his startlingly good looks.
sentences.chinese: 作爲表演者，柯蒂斯驚豔的英俊外貌可謂得天獨厚。

sentences.english: Situated on a quiet "island" in the crowded city, Yujingwan Garden boasts of its unique geographic position.
sentences.chinese: 大亞灣“渝景灣花園”鬧中取靜，地理位置得天獨厚。

sentences.english: My country is blessed with unsurpassed natural resources.
sentences.chinese: 我國有得天獨厚的自然資源。

sentences.english: The ecological environment of Guide province's be richly endowed by nature, is a rare plateau oasis.
sentences.chinese: 貴德的生態環境得天獨厚，是全省少有的高原綠洲。

sentences.english: Rich spring salt resources in Three-Gorge region are generously endowed by Nature, and have a long history in production.
sentences.chinese: 三峽地區，鹽泉資源得天獨厚，泉鹽生產歷史悠久。

sentences.english: Such fantastic nature environment makes the largest peach farm in the world.
sentences.chinese: 平谷得天獨厚的自然環境，孕育出了世界最大的桃園。

sentences.english: That boy was born with a silver spoon in his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 那個男孩是一位得天獨厚的天子驕子。

definition: to own exclusively/unique to/specific/there is only
location/geographical position/position on a grid or spreadsheet, where 區|区 denotes the row and 位 the column
